lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: someone helped me.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have very little in life. I am in college, and can only afford it because of Finanical Aid. Now that I am here, I am saving what little I can to try and help other people in the world who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at University

lender.name: Tom Volkar
lender.loan_because: I love the spirit of independence displayed by these entrepreneurs. Their determination inspires me.
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients discover and engage in work that makes their heart sing with both fulfillment and financial prosperity.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I love that these people have aspired to do something, they have dreams, I want to help them get there......
lender.occupational_info: I design womens footwear. I have my own company called Chaos & Harmony - it's an amazing journey that keeps me on my toes.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: The Farren Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in empowering people to make a self-sustaining life for themselves, to establish pride in their work, and to have self-esteem.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Economic injustice sucks and microfinancing is cool.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to make a contribution to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a school psychologist.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I respect a strong work ethic and the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: The Stormagans
lender.loan_because: it seems like the very least we can do.

lender.name: Gulley
lender.loan_because: people have needs that I am able to help them fulfill.
lender.occupational_info: I am an employee of the United States Government. I manage a variety of goods and services which people rely on daily.

lender.name: The Baughers
lender.occupational_info: I work on information systems which help my company become more efficient

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe our generation can bring justice to the world - i want to be part of that. AND by loaning, a lil goes WAY further! This site is amazing...
lender.occupational_info: As a designer I create a mixture of images and words on a computer in a way that is artistic but comunicates a message. My goal (and hope) is to impact people with my work so that it becomes something of worth to them and hopefully something they keep, not throw away. Currently i am working for (and am part of) a church called Mosaic (New Zeland)

lender.name: kate
lender.loan_because: I want to help others very much.
lender.occupational_info: A helpful act.

lender.name: Andy
lender.occupation: Connecting Good People with Great Opportunities
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the entrepreneurial spirit. I believe that the drive and passion of an entrepreneur is the force that will change one community at a time and thereby change the world
lender.occupational_info: There is nothing that I am more convince of than the power of Good People and Great Opportunities. Combining the two can and has led to the greatest advancements in the world and will continue to do so. I want to be a part of that and have built my network and my world to provide that opportunity.

lender.name: Milton
lender.loan_because: A kind friend gave me 50 dollars to get started with Kiva and I've been talking about it ever since. It matters to me that my help connects directly with someone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I am exploring how we might design better institutions for the future by combining ideas with smart delivery.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I believe Microfinance to be a very effective and dignified way to fight and eradicate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a real estate appraiser, which means I estimate the value of a house in a real estate transaction.

lender.name: Halvor
lender.loan_because: I like the idea behind Kiva, and I hope this can make a difference to some entrepeneurs and their businesses.

lender.name: The Johnsons
lender.loan_because: "When it's all over, it's not who you were . . . it's whether you made a difference."
lender.occupational_info: My husband teaches hospitals how to use equipement they purchase and I recently graduated as an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: As an American who has been very fortunate, I feel an obligation to help other people in less advantageous circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work to promote conservation of our natural resources, especially the protection of unique natural areas in the state of Maine.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have not gotten to where I am without the help of others, and I want to repay that generosity by helping other hard working and good people around the world. I love Kiva because it shows the world that everyday Americans really DO care about others all around the world! Best of luck to my partners and I hope this finds you well!
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer hardware & software products for the Data Storage Industry. I visit customers and travel to trade shows to evangelize our technology. I really enjoy the travel and meeting people!

lender.name: Zen
lender.loan_because: I feel that this method of financial exchange is a solution toward ending poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Hopefully, if I put my mind to it, I can take my international relations degree and go off to see the world, experience different cultures and gain a little wisdom.

lender.name: martin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Aldrin & Rani
lender.loan_because: We feel that we can help a little.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: "Life ends when you stop dreaming, hope ends when you stop believing, love ends when you stop caring, friendship ends when you stop sharing... so share this with whom ever you consider a friend."
lender.occupational_info: I am the airline's best kept safety secret.

lender.name: Dennis & Christina
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to be able to.

lender.name: Leeann
lender.loan_because: i think this is quite possibly the greatest idea ever.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a full time student studying anthropology.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: the need is great and I am able.

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because: Wanting to make a difference by transforming lives - helping others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Beancounter - helping small business take care of business

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people are entitled to decent living conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public library assisting people find books to read either for personal pleasure or to help them with research they are doing.

lender.name: Anoop
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer at a startup in Silicon valley.

lender.name: Ying
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to have better life
lender.occupational_info: develop new anti-cancer therapies

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: my neighbors are everywhere
lender.occupational_info: I study how the earth works

lender.name: Sami and Grandpa
lender.loan_because: My grandfather and I thought this was a great way to help other people around the world.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: how could I not ?
lender.occupational_info: Acquire land on behalf of the Government so that homes can be built for people in need.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out a hand to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental and emotional problems.

lender.name: Maxly
lender.loan_because: I want to support others to reach for what is important for them
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, trainer, communicator, global consultant

lender.name: Nathan and Christy
lender.loan_because: The love of Jesus inside us compels us to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Nathan works to maintain computer servers. Christy manages the computer helpdesk and repair team. She works for Spring Arbor University. He works for the local hospital system.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I have the benefits of education, good fortune and health.

lender.name: Liz
lender.occupation: I market stuff on the web
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, in development, in the interconnectedness of nations, and in doing the right thing. Aid alone does not work; I believe microfinance is part of the solution. In the spirit of putting my money where my mouth is, I served as a Kiva Fellow with Caurie Microfinance in Senegal in the spring of 2009.

lender.name: ILYAS
lender.loan_because: I love watching something grow and transform
lender.occupational_info: I write music for choirs to sing and I am a doctor

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot - but I have enough. Every one in the world should have the chance to support themselves and their families - and to enjoy life. I do this because I love people! :-D
lender.occupational_info: I work serving food at a Corporate Restaurant in order to raise money to pay for my education. I hope to be an attorney of International law and am currently studying Anthropology.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money.

lender.name: Myra Spence
lender.loan_because: People need.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: It makes sense!

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do. I've seen what can be accomplished with the accumulated efforts of individuals as a group. As one person, fixing poor situations seem too overwhelming, if at all possible. Joining others, in a group effort, makes a difference. It might seem small at the start, however, I've had first hand experience of how things can be made better, over time. As the saying goes, "How Do You Eat an Elephant"? Answer, "One Bite At A Time".
lender.occupational_info: I work in the biopharmaceutical manufacturing industry. My work consist of evaluating systems, operations and manufactring procedures and operations. From these evaluations, decisions are made as to the proper performance and/or identifying systemic problems which require correction and/or improvement.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: we all need to be helping each other.
lender.occupational_info: I teach masters level college students in software engineering management.

lender.name: Darcy
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group home program for at-risk adolescents

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I can't afford much, but Kiva lets me share what I do have with others.
lender.occupational_info: Making sure what people read in magazines is clear and interesting.

lender.name: Niek
lender.loan_because: I like to make a personal contribution to the development of others
lender.occupational_info: I implement changes in business or non-profit organisations aimed at business improvement, efficiency and professional working relations

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: It is to everyone's benefit to increase the economic well-being in the world. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer.

lender.name: Karol
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: Fun!

lender.name: Balaji
lender.loan_because: i care..i guess atleast a little

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: People should help people, not faceless organizations.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: i just want to help
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are retired. My husband used to be a mail man. I used to sell new homes.

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: You unlock this golden door with the key of opportunity. A small donation from those of us that have, to those who seek to better their condition through hard work, is the best investment in the world, and a wise investment for the brotherhood of human kind.
lender.occupational_info: I am a motion picture editor in Hollywood, California.

lender.name: Rabbi Jacob
lender.loan_because: One of the spiritual pillars of the world is Tzedaka-Justice.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to help people materially, emotionally and spiritually.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Because I have received help in my lifetime and I repay the help I received by helping others when I can.
lender.occupational_info: Former teacher and business person.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that even a small amount can make a big difference. I love the fact that people are represented as business people requesting money to get started so they can improve their own lives and stand up to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a publisher.

lender.name: Morten N. Pedersen
lender.loan_because: Want to help and its needed

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: My wife & I have done volunteer work in East Africa and seen the impact of microloans to women. Not without problems but generally very effective.
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a business training people in the financial sector in Sydney Australia

lender.name: Andy & Mary
lender.occupation: Andy is a writer. Mary is retired.
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers us a wonderful opportunity to do something good for somebody else.

lender.name: Alessia
lender.loan_because: Nothing makes me feel better than helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I write and publish books about love and lovers.

lender.name: Nicole& Tony
lender.loan_because: My husband and I know how fortunate we are and we believe strongly in the power of many small acts adding up to create major change. We want to teach our children by example rather than preaching.
lender.occupational_info: We both work hard and try to find joy in the simple things in life.

lender.name: Sanna
lender.occupational_info: I make leather handbags

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Loaning money to people is a way to help others survive and provide for their families. These are people that seem to be working very hard to achieve a goal in their life that they are working towards. I ran my own contracting business for 17 years and know how hard it is to survive as a self employed entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I currently write software for use in the Animal Health Care industry. I have written software and designed hardware for various applications including laboratory robotics, nuclear medicine, and human pharmaceutical development.

lender.name: Lucenda
lender.loan_because: this is my contribution for a better world.

lender.name: Bridget & Joe
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I want to be a small part of empowering women who can then empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math to elementary school kids.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor to teenagers ages mainly 14 - 18. I pastor at a Mennonite church.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I can see where the money goes, and because loans to entrepreneurs serve to empower people and communities, rather than creating or sustaining dependency.
lender.occupational_info: I help turn new inventions -- in computers, biotechnology and medicine -- into useful commercial products.

lender.name: La Vernia High School
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in others lives and make a better world.
lender.occupational_info: La Vernia High School history students, La Vernia, Texas

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: If people don't help people no one will.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: As a teacher, I want my students to understand the meaning of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fifth-grade teacher.

lender.name: Mike and Lacy
lender.loan_because: it is a small way we are able to help those in other countries to improve their lives and communities.

lender.name: La Vernia High School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a better world and help those who are workng to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: History students at La Vernia High School in La Vernia, Texas.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in what has been provided to me and this is my way of sharing my fortune.
lender.occupational_info: Software developer looking for work.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I care about helping others less fortunate than me- and in some small way making the world a better place. My hope is make a positive impact on someone's life. It's a nice feeling!

lender.name: Monica Lauren
lender.loan_because:
I believe that Change Starts with Ordinary People doing Extraordinary Things to Make a Difference.
Ignorance is not Bliss. We need to let the World change us, so we can change the World.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I come from a Third World country.

lender.name: La Vernia High School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help tose who are trying to help themselves. We want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: History students at La Vernia High School, La Vernia, Texas.

lender.name: Noreen
lender.loan_because: Our Pathfinder Unit thought that this is a great way to help others and learn about their countries while learning to manage our own finances.

lender.name: Asha & Sudeep
lender.loan_because: Born and raised in Nepal, we have a first hand knowledge of the credit crisis small business entrepreneurs face in developing countries. We would like to help empower them and hopefully our small loan would positively impact their businesses and their lives.

lender.name: Keala
lender.loan_because: I have come to deeply respect the ability of people to make a life out of the most humble tools and resources. I greatly admire their ingenuity, their determination, their imagination and capacity to hope, but overall I admire their ability to take those strengths and use them to change their world. I loan because I also want to change the world in my own small way, and ultimately to be a part of something larger than myself.

lender.name: Emilia
lender.loan_because: I need continued work in "this planet and care de oxigen with many trees and to make a ecologyc farm
lender.occupational_info: Well, my work is too, in first time, to the care of medio Ambiente. and the second time, to may mothersn with childres, but to be singles.

lender.name: kim
lender.loan_because: I am excited about what this site is doing in the lives of folks around the world. As a person who spends half the year in 3rd world countries for work, I see first hand very ambitious people living in poverty...and how it could be eliminated when an opportunity is realized.

lender.name: La Vernia High School
lender.loan_because: We loan to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: History students at La Vernia High School, La Vernia, Texas.

lender.name: Marjolein
lender.loan_because: It's good to do so.

lender.name: Nikki and Kian
lender.loan_because: Kian says we made the loans because we wanted to help them get a bettter life.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make technical drawings for different buildings' systems (telecom, a/v, security, etc.)

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I guess I'm not being very original here, but I think this a great opportunity to help people find their way out of poverty through local initiatives - rather than large-scale industrial crap. This also a way for those people to use their entrepreneurial skills and develop them through the learning by doing process, which would not have been accessible to the less wealthy tiers of the population.
lender.occupational_info: I read words and try to frame them in a way the professor doesn't have the choice to jot down an "A" on my sheet.

lender.name: Rachel 11 yrs Tori 8 yrs
lender.occupational_info: Rachel - 11 years old & Tori -8 years old

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.occupational_info: I help people start businesses

lender.name: Tilly
lender.loan_because: It gives women the chance to control their own destinies and gain financial freedom. Even with opportunities, we all need assistance from time to time. As a woman, I believe that it is important to support other women in their endeavours, as they empower themselves and enrich the lives of those around them. With the access to education, finance and ability to financially support themselves, they can have choices and freedom. I send both lenders and entrepreneurs, the very best of wishes for success.

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: we must.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Its a way to "give back" that gives me direct information about how my contributions are working for people.
lender.occupational_info: I build computer cameras - cameras that take pictures that are for a computer, not a person.

lender.name: Robbie
lender.loan_because: I want to feel more directly involved with someone I am helping than I do when I send funds to a more anonymous individual.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching in the state system. I taught students from age five to 17 over the years. Now, i volunteer in my last school.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I feel so lucky with my life circumstances and family and friends. I think this is a great way to show gratitude to the world by helping someone to attain their goals and better their lives.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: what I can give makes a big difference for someone else

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: It's just one of my ways to contribute positively to the lives of others!
lender.occupational_info: Nothing but Love :)

lender.name: nkf
lender.loan_because: People who want to better themselves deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Investments.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Lot's of typing in front of a computer.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: there is no completely logical reason I have the money and another doesn't so why should I keep it? God blesses people so it can overflow to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help inner city churches do health outreaches in their communities

lender.name: Dino & Sara
lender.loan_because:
I truly believe that any one person through the smallest of good deeds can stand up and make a meaningful difference in this world.
YOU must be the change you wish to see in the world. ~Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big office with a bunch of Lawyers.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: a few dollars can have a small impact here but a big impact elsewhere.
lender.occupational_info: Some like college because of the free time. Others like working because of the money. As a grad student, I have neither, but I'm still having a great time.

lender.name: Soularwave
lender.loan_because: One person affects thousands with just one act of kindness... like a drop that causes a ripple that leads to a tidal wave.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create jewelry from natural gemstones, precious metals, and other natural materials.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I love the whole world.
lender.occupational_info: I play trumpet and install solar panels

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: As a Christian, I am supposed to help others, and I also enjoy doing that.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am at a temorary assigment in an office processing both accounts payable and account receivable invoices.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to pass on the opportunities I was given when I needed them to other people now.
lender.occupational_info: I do administrative work for small business people (mainly coaches) who are located anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Trudy & Bill
lender.loan_because: At this time in our lives, we feel most fortunate to be able to help others who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help people to secure their future should there be a loss (fire, theft, flood) -- basically we help people get back on their feet when a loss occurs

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps, it would be hard to lend someone $1,000 but together with others I am able to make a difference, I thank KIVA for making it possible . . .
lender.occupational_info: I teach art and art history to students ages 14 - 18.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I spent a career as a lender & see how simple loans can change people's lives. Now I would also like to help people struggling in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Today I am retired but my former work was meeting with people, hearing their needs & goals & making loan decisions for our Credit Union. Since I was there for 15 years, many people came back to me & I got to see the changes & improvements in their lives.

lender.name: Rhodenid
lender.loan_because: I love people with the love of our Lord Jesus.

lender.name: Arj79
lender.loan_because: Help people around the world. Reset the poverty!
lender.occupational_info: I repair and sell computer.

lender.name: The Comforter
lender.loan_because: So many people have helped me along my journey so it is only reasonable that I "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I help people, particularly women, who are in difficult circumstances through their life issues. Loans made have been facilitated with the help of my dear friends, Mark Chiang and Mark Guevarra.

lender.name: kavita
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings that have been shared with me.
lender.occupational_info: I help care for women and help them as they give birth.

lender.name: leidy
lender.occupation: independiente en el area de arreglo de computadore

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in small but life changing ways and if I can give back in any way I feel obligated.
lender.occupational_info: I help social workers provide services to victims of family violence

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky I am to live here and how easy it would be for me to need help, not be lucky enough to be able to provide it. I couldn't pass up a great chance like this to provide a little opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital obtaining financing for projects.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Something so small can make such a big difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer within the community trying to improve communication between residents

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help people directly without creating dependency on aid

lender.name: Craig & Melanie
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to make a concrete difference.

lender.name: Troubadours
lender.loan_because: We believe in equality & opportunity for all.
lender.occupational_info: sing, play instruments, work to share Mighty Kindness

lender.name: Padma
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fighting chance and a helping hand to do it. I am lucky enough to have the resources to be that hand.
lender.occupational_info: Get people to use products.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because:
My money gets more bang for the buck in these areas(helps more people as a whole)
tho only those who have good idea's.
I have no children yet so the relating to me in this way is hard for me to understand. Basic plan of action is best.
lender.occupational_info: sell restaurant equipment from Florida

lender.name: Global World
lender.loan_because: I want my students to see a way they can help change the world. The personal apect of this site helps make the impact of my students' contributions tangible.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the sixth grade. My students are 11 and 12 years old.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I can help equalize...a little bit at a time...

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: microcredit is the most viable way available to make a real impact on poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I play the saxophone and teach saxophone lessons

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I would like to help entrepreuners in developing countries become more financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I advise clients on how to manage income, assets and liabilities with the goal of becoming financially independent.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it's easy.
lender.occupational_info: I help traditional family farms thrive as sustainable businesses.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: it feels so much better to give a "hand up" then to give a "hand out"

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Every person has a moral obligation to help their fellow man.

lender.name: Frans Saenen
lender.loan_because: I can & see the good in doing so. It is the best way charity can work. My $$ strait to where it is needed. And you are not giving it away. It is just a loan.

lender.name: Anja
lender.loan_because: its the least you can do to help make the world a better place and to help the people help themselves.

lender.name: Aleksandr
lender.loan_because: I believe in people

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be born in a wealthy country like the Netherlands. I have all the posibilities to do what I want. With microfinance I want to give other people the possibilities to do what they want.

lender.name: Chihiro
lender.loan_because: I was impressed the way individuals can support other individuals who need suppport from all over the world!

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: It's the best way I found to help people in developing countries
lender.occupational_info: I seat in front of my computer and code all day long :)

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Each person counts.

lender.name: Nibu Eapen Pappachan
lender.loan_because:
The cross of Jesus is the supreme evidence of the love of God.
There is no greater love than that of Christ above, That made Him stop to earth, become a Man, And by His death provide redemptions plan; There is no greater love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working as a Database Administrator

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I hope it will have a small positive impact on a small part of the world

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea. I am a firm believe in the ripple effect and by being a good steward of what I have, the world can move forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to follow their bliss. I teach attitudes, strategies and methods people can use to live happier, more blissful, lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is the most important thing to an individual entrepenuer

lender.name: Pablo and Claire
lender.occupational_info: Musician

lender.name: Euphoria
lender.loan_because:
Life's most persistent and urgent question is: What are you doing for others? Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
An effort made for the happiness of others lifts us above ourselves. Lydia Maria Child

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school at an international school.

lender.name: dolores
lender.loan_because: This is in memory of our parents, Clemence & Beatrice Krentz. You are dearly missed. Love, Dolores, Margaret, Arlene, Westley, Mary-Lou, Elaine, Gord and Cameron.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I can. simple as that.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.occupation: Mother, wife, accountant and general dogs body?
lender.loan_because: Sure, doesn't a little go a long long way...
lender.occupational_info: Mother, wife, accountant, carpenter, electrician, business expert, hairdresser, beautician, agenda and general bottle washer. Being a working mother makes you very resourceful and you can do anything

lender.name: Bill & Patti
lender.loan_because: I had the opportunity to make a good living which enabled me to live with respect and dignity and now it's my turn to help someone else have the same opportunity!! Thank you KIVA!!

lender.name: David Andersson
lender.occupation: CEO at Ecoera Biofuel Engineering AB
lender.loan_because: Rural development is the key to a more sustainable future.
lender.occupational_info: I am increasing the rate at which the society can switch from fossil to renewable fuels.

lender.name: Stlios
lender.loan_because: I believe the future of development resides in human capital. Innovation, Drive, and Realization are the qualities small entrepreneurs throughout the world have, but cannot realize because of a lack of capital. As a student I don't have much money, but find it crucial to put a little bit in the Kiva basket!
lender.occupational_info: I am an International student from France at GVSU in Grand Rapids, MI, United States. I am currently working towards an MBA and wish to pursue a career in socially-conscious business.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredits do work!
lender.occupational_info: Director of an IT company

lender.name: tricia brown
lender.loan_because: it's important to have a keen awareness of what's going on in the world and to not take things for granted. Contributing as little as $25 can impact a family across the world, leading to a better life and self sustaining business. There's no reason not to help! "Small acts, when multiplied by millions of people, can transform the world." Howard Zinn
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large corporation in finance, and volunteer as an arts mentor for abused, at-risk, neglected children.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: "Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little" - Edmund Burke
lender.occupational_info: I am in Advertising

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: For a small amount of money, I can make a difference in the life of a person trying to improve their life and the lives of their family
lender.occupational_info: I own a sound equipment rental company in Tucson, AZ. We do live concerts and also rent equipment to individuals.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Every little bit back to the world helps.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an occasional Professor and teacher of art, as well as an artist.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
it's a privilege to be able to help others around the world. I'm inspired by the great service that Kiva is providing to the developing world.
Thornton Wilder said, "Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow."
lender.occupational_info: I manage assets of institutions and high-net-worth individuals. Our investment philosophy is to "invest in the best."

lender.name: Barreda Family
lender.loan_because: Having the ability to help someone is a gift to be shared

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping directly people in need.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I believe business can play an important role in enabling sustainable development.

lender.name: Mrs. V
lender.loan_because: I care and I can. I know how difficult it can be to obtain start-up captial for a new business. These people deserve a chance, especially to provide for their family.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: energy, love, a space for clarity and movement - inviting true freedom in the heart!

lender.name: Holly
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of technology folks who implement and maintain systems to support personal insurance products.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: The world is a very small place, and we are all in this together.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: "...the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts; and that things are not so ill with you and me as they might have been, is half owing to the number who lived faithfully a hidden life, and rest in unvisited tombs." - George Elliot, Middlemarch

lender.name: Tom and Diane
lender.loan_because:
People willing to work hard should have access to capital to build their business.
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." -- Anne Frank

lender.name: Molly
lender.occupational_info: I manage clinical studies of new drugs

lender.name: enREDados

We offer web hosting solutions with JSP/Servlets, J2EE, PHP, mySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle...
Ofrecemos soluciones de hospedaje web con JSP/Servlets, J2EE, PHP, mySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle...

lender.name: Diana O
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I support and teach mothers and babies to be able to breastfeed successfully for as long as they want. This is a chance for children and mothers to have better health.

lender.name: Will Holt
lender.loan_because: it improves the world, effectively and efficiently. I've loaned $23,000 to date in 230 different loans with no defaults (yet).
lender.occupational_info: Professionally, I help lend money to large corporations. On Kiva, I help lend money to small-scale international entrepreneurs.

lender.name: J.P.
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a shot at following their dream.
lender.occupational_info: Magazine editor

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am so thankful for all of my blessings and want to reach out to those in need.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I can, and because there's so much good in my life it would be wrong not to spread some around. Also, I've been helped a lot, so passing help on is both a pleasure and moral duty.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: My current investment portfolio needs less correlation to US equities.
lender.occupational_info: I do stuff and I hope to branch out into also doing things.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: helping others is what life is really all about....isn't it??

lender.name: Glicerio
lender.loan_because: The world is just one and people need each other always. Today is for them tomorrow will be you.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: the same money can help many people.

lender.name: Fabian
lender.occupation: Team Coach and Manager of Javison United F.C.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Maimonides said the highest form of charity is helping the less fortunate achieve independence, so that they will not have to depend on charity.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I want to give to people who need a helping hand. I hope that I can help someone change their life in a positive way! Sure feels good too.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a desk and work on the computer. I assist other associates in their company's initiatives.

lender.name: Derek Getch
lender.loan_because: I have the money to help.
lender.occupational_info: I review computer programs to make sure they work as they are required.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Christian principles compel me to share.
lender.occupational_info: I make furniture out of wood.

lender.name: Alfredo Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that this is the only way we can end poverty. My family is blessed and we have everything we need; so I feel it's our social responsibiltiy to give back to those in need.

lender.name: Cas and Jim Czarnezki
lender.loan_because: The good we do ripples out into the world and makes a better home for all of us. Our donation may mean more than we'll ever know.
lender.occupational_info: Others have given us favors so we pass a favor on to make the world a kinder place.

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: I find it the most effective way to support an entrepreneur that want to develop its business, while participating to a global effort to make live better
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in worldwide information technology projects to help large business run more effectively on a global scale

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help. Micro loans make sense and they have proven to be very successful. There is no limit to amount of 'need' on the globe and Kiva puts a face to some of those stories.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories about interesting people, events and themes.

lender.name: Puneet
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who want to help themselves. I believe in hard work and want to support people who are willing to put in the hard work and are not able to make something out of their lives because they do not have the financial resources.
lender.occupational_info: My work is related to financing medium to large size businesses. I am also actively involved in financing large real estate projects.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate, to have a job and be able to provide for my daughter and would like to help others to achieve fianancial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I work in managing risk for a telecomunications company

lender.name: Marc & Christen
lender.loan_because: Our 10th wedding anniversary is tomorrow and instead of spending the money on some fancy dinner or something for ourselves, we thought the best testament to what we've stood for together all these years is giving to others. We think of it as a gift both to us and to someone trying to keep their family together, just as we have.
lender.occupational_info: Marc works in HR to hire, promote and help employees do their best job possible at work. Christen teaches leadership to college students.

lender.name: Elizabeth and Don
lender.loan_because: It is a small affordable way to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a classroom with students who need extra help to succeed. I support the teacher in her work also.

lender.name: Archibald
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: We own successful restaurants.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: From the moment I first heard of Muhammad Yunus and micro-lending, several years ago, I was absolutely inspired by the idea---and I still am. I love that one person on one side of the world can do something that impacts the lives of a family or a community on the other side. This community of Kiva is a gift for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide safe, clean, affordable housing for families.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse in neonatal intensive care.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: Funds for the continuation of a seafood restaurant
lender.occupational_info: Fast Food Restaurant regional antojitos

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: New pair of shoes or change a life? No brainer.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I am amazed at how little money it takes to help someone better his or her life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach accounting (contibilidad, if I remember my Spanish correctly).

lender.name: Total Package consulting
lender.loan_because: When trying to help themselves , everyone deserves a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Packaging consultants creative and design firm.

lender.name: Phuong
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: UO Nonprofit Class 07
lender.loan_because: we cant to make a small difference in the world. We are strong believers of the nonprofit sector and together, we will soon make a change!

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small businesses to improve lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses attract customers on the internet.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Governments and large "aid" institutions like world bank have failed and are unable to affect any positive changes at the level of the individual.
lender.occupational_info: I have a company that designs and manufactures UV protective clothing for kids. The goal is to instill safe sun habits at an early age.

lender.name: Paul & Julia
lender.loan_because: Because we care and because we can.
lender.occupational_info: Julia works for a PBS television station. Paul is a territory manager for a floor covering manufacturer.

lender.name: Majdi A.J
lender.loan_because: Treat others like i want to be treated. im only human and i will need help one way or another one day and that's when i will hopefully collect my return on investment.

lender.name: Girl Soldier
lender.loan_because: I love to help other people improve their lives while I have the means to do so. I believe there are enough resources in our world to go around for each person to have at least their basic daily needs met. I hate to see people go without their basic needs when they are making the effort by working hard. If you have the means to help another person, do so and do it today, you may not have tomorrow to do it or they may not have tomorrow. Now is your time to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a U.S soldier for 6 years and enjoy every bit of what I do for my country. I am glad to be able to say that I have experienced what no money could have bought and no school could have provided. Priceless experience.

lender.name: SOUFIANE LAILANI
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: There have been times when people did small things (for them) that were of huge help to me. I like to pass on those favors.
lender.occupational_info: I develop coatings and films that are used as components in various industrial products (everything from TVs to photovoltaic panels).

lender.name: iju
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I play marimba and teach school band.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great cause!

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I think it's wonderful to be able to see directly where my money is going, and I love the idea that a loan can make such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Engineers Without Borders Australia, who work with disadvantaged communities around the world to improve their quality of life through sustainable engineering projects.

lender.name: Yonuk&Noriko
lender.loan_because: Someone challenging to better life like us who are trying to reallize our new dream gives us lots of energy and encourages so warmly.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: There's much need in the world. It's a privilege to participate in a program that helps people become more self-sufficent.
lender.occupational_info: Information provider

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because:
Originally. to stuff the regular charities that I had supported in the past. Their redirection of funds and or lack of allocating a major portion of donations to the actual cause sickened me, I felt like I was a patsy. I saw Kiva as a way to provide me with the power to see my money mean something.
Today, I continue to do it because it makes me feel good that someone will pay it forward. Like the circle of life so too will this money keep going.
lender.occupational_info:
Lots of number checking of sales. cash received and money to pay out. And at the end of the month I let the owners know what profit they made that month and in the last 12 months total.
Basically you must love numbers and computers

lender.name: Constance Burger
lender.loan_because: I loan because I really care about giving people a sense of dignity. I know it means a lot to me when I accomplish something toward financial independence in my life, and so I know it means a lot to the people who receive our loans.
lender.occupational_info:
I write the stories and poetry that rise up in my heart in hopes to encourage and inspire humanity.
JUST BELIEVE Youve got to see beyond the moment. Youve got to see beyond the now. For theres a place to see, A future destiny, With no need - to ask how.
Oh just believe, just believe, Remember those words you heard in your heart, It was no fantasy. Oh just believe, just believe, For that day in time - when all is defined, And all is redeemed.
Just close your eyes, And let your heart take you there again. The first time - when your heart, Made hope - its true friend.
Spend time with your dreams there, Painting all their colors supreme. Filling in all the details, And taking them to the extreme.
Oh just believe, just believe, Remember those words you heard in your heart, It was no fantasy. Oh just believe, just believe, For that day in time - that all is defined, And all is redeemed.

lender.name: Zaadz Visionary Music
lender.loan_because:
This lender's account is fueled by sales of the Zaadz Visionary Music community's benefit compilation, "The Dream Is Valid." All of the artists and businesspeople involved get exposure, and all proceeds get recirculated the world over to empower people. People get great music by shopping in alignment with their values, and their money helps promote sustainable business practices. Everyone wins and we prove that the good, beautiful, true, and practical can all support each other.
For more information, please visit http://thedreamisvalid.bandcamp.com
lender.occupational_info:
We are a community of artists and appreciators who recognize a new relationship between art, business, science, and spirituality - and are exploring the new commerce of art as loving effort.
Our benefit compilation can be listened to and purchased at http://thedreamisvalid.bandcamp.com

lender.name: Schrodinger
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Sleep, Eat, Sleep, Invest in good people, Sleep.

lender.name: Asha
lender.loan_because: I am in desperate need of $9,000.00. I have been running my home based business successfully for the last 6 years, it afforded me the opportunity together with my husband's job to purchase our own home. My problem arised when I started having kids, kid #1 came in 2004, kid #2 came in 2006 and now kid #3 who is just 2 months old. My business has the potential to do very very well, but my problem is when i got pregant with my third baby, my 2nd baby was just 2 months old and having two subsequent pregnancies that close together it left me very very exhausted and unable to run my business. My husband worked very hard to take care of the house bills and the other two kids, since he is not very educated he can do only trade jobs, it did pay some bills but not enough to totally pay all. Now I had my third baby and I am very well now but my business is suffering, I lost many customers during the time i was pregant. I need this money to catch up on many bills, Property taxes in arrears for one year 3000.00 , tax return due $532.00, power and gas in arrears $400.00 and many other bills. I do not want to loose my house, this is the first house i have ever owned, i am making my mortgage payments just fine. Please if you people out there can help me get out of this problem I will be sure to PAY BACK THE LOAN. Once my backlogged bills gets taken care of then I am back to square one and can afford all my bills and more since I am in full health after having the 3rd baby. Together with my husband and my salary we can have a very good living. Thanks so very much.
lender.occupational_info: Costume Jewelry. Stay at home mom with 3 kids to support.

lender.name: Ann & Rob
lender.loan_because: We have travelled and met just the sort of people for whom Kiva is set up. It is our way of putting something back in.
lender.occupational_info: Rob works as an educational manager and I work in publishing and computing coaching.

lender.name: Almeta
lender.loan_because: I see the importance of microeconomics
lender.occupational_info: Raising future leaders

lender.name: Khanh
lender.loan_because: I need to enlarge our cinnamon-worm farm. We use cinnamon-worm to feed the fish.
lender.occupational_info: You will smell the cinnamon in place where people think it can't be. That is my farm.

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: It is great to be able to help those who are helping themselves; and by offering so little it means so much to them.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: I feel spoiled to live in the relatively wealthy USA where we complain about the slightest inconvenience. It is great to be able to share in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I run the office of a brilliant, compassionate, world-class attorney; I do everything needed to help him offer legal services to our clients and to interact with the Courts. We provide urgently needed assistance to people who truly deserve the help. I love it.

lender.name: Hunter
lender.occupation: Director of Programs, Pat Tillman Foundation
lender.loan_because: I am human.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Radiology

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Many small actions can change the world.

lender.name: Elleni
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and feel blessed. To be able to assist someone in need in a real and valuable way is a wonderful thing.
lender.occupational_info: I had my own business - selling beds to people. . I am now retired after being injured in a road accident.

lender.name: Darin Greyerbiehl
lender.loan_because: I've seen how it works...and it works well.

lender.name: Tami
lender.occupation: Interior Architect, Life Adventurer, Kiva Fellow
lender.loan_because: I've seen with my own eyes that just a little bit makes a difference in the lives of those with limited resources + opportunity

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: as tough as times get, I never forget how fortunate I am.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer for internet applications.

lender.name: pamela
lender.loan_because: If it was any of us living in a third world country wouldn't we want help? My heart goes out to those folks that need a loan to improve their lives at the cost of a nice dinner for most of us.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities for people.
lender.occupational_info: libraries = free education education = a better world

lender.name: Lutz
lender.loan_because: I believe that supporting enterpreuners is more useful than another tax-funded development project that does not address the needs of its recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I study civil wars and their causes.

lender.name: Athar
lender.loan_because: Have been thru difficult times when out of no where Allah's savior helped me. I feel Kiva is one of Allah's saviors for those who are ready to work hard to come out of difficult times.

lender.name: Eskil Busck Andersen
lender.loan_because: I believe its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Rameri
lender.occupation: Monkey Wrangler and General Manager of Tomfoolery
lender.loan_because: An accident of birth and I am here with the capacity to help others. Had I been born somewhere else, and been less fortunate than I am, I would hope others would help me.

lender.name: Adibah
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping others to one's best ability... what kiva is doing is something that I personally believe in and I'm glad to be able to help someone else who needs that helping hand... it gives hope and God-willing, life will get better... :)
lender.occupational_info: My company is a solution provider and integrator for Intelligent Transportation Systems. My role is to grow our market share, explore and expand our business portfolio. My lovely daughter, who will be turning 6 soon, is the source of my strength, inspiration and happiness...

lender.name: Malavan
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for an Higher Education Institute

lender.name: Gbenga
lender.loan_because: i want to build a community resource centre for poor young people in Ghana. The centre will allow them access information, read books, train them on business skills etc.
lender.occupational_info: Community development, information sharing, youth development and micro-finance

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Each and every one of us has the opportunity to make a difference each and every day. And every time someone makes a difference, no matter how small, in the life of someone else, every one of us benefits just a little bit as well.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and conduct both instructor-lead and web-based training programs.

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: We need to learn to share.
lender.occupational_info: I not only read Tarot but listen to the problems of others and try to help in whatever way I can. Sometimes it is just enough to listen quietly.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because:
"The gratification of wealth is not found in mere possession or in lavish expenditure, but in its wise application."
Miguel de Cervantes (1547-1616) Spanish novelist, dramatist and poet.
Kiva is one small way to be part of finding solutions for Global Inequality on many levels.
lender.occupational_info: The Best Shoe Store and Repair shop in town!!!! THE SHOE DOCTOR! Even though we are a very busy full Shoe Repair we also sell Quality Footwear and Apparel from around the world understanding that as a business owner I have a DUTY to support companies that practice Fair Trade Standards ensuring workers are paid a living wage!

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I've enjoyed the fruits of my own endeavours and had help and advice along the way. Paying something forward to an individual who wants to help themselves just seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small systems house specialising in supplying systems and software to the Foodservice Distribution Industry.

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: Jesus first loved me. How can I not give a loving hand to help others?

lender.name: Roswitha
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be safe, fed, and have a dream. I want to help others improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I love books and travel.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I was captured by how well this program works.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: we all need to do our part to help each other live full, dignified, and healthy lives.

lender.name: Lady Lodge Systems
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems a far better idea than spending this money on Christmas cards for our customers.
lender.occupational_info: LLS is a small systems house providing Systems and Software for the Foodservice Distribution Industry

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: i've been loaned to

lender.name: TUSAAF Stars & Stripes
lender.loan_because: We try to help Youth American Football programs in new areas overseas who are looking to expand or improve American Football programs abroad. TUSAAF works on a very limited budget and works on trying to help new organization recieve aid in building Americna Football programs from top to bottum.
lender.occupational_info: Team promotes the goodwill of American Football around the world and works with different Youth and amateur organizations to promote the sport in professional manner at the amateur level. TUSAAF has volunteers in the United States and abroad who work on different events to help with the growth of American Football in new areas and up and coming areas that are intersted in starting American Football programs or create new american football programs with highly qualified instructors from the United States who are many case located overseas.

lender.name: brittany
lender.loan_because: I believe in open hands.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a radio station in Atlanta, GA, where I talk on the radio introducing songs & talking about music & station events. I also do lots of station promotion throughout the city.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: My Christian faith is all about loving. Justice flows from love. Giving restores justice. Giving is loving.
lender.occupational_info: I'm founder of The Water Project, Inc. a non-profit working to provide clean water to developing communities around the world. Come get involved!

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: This is one way of ending the hideous gap between rich and poor
lender.occupational_info: Helping others make money.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: i can help make someone's life better for the cost of a meal out at a restaurant.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a small internet & phone company.

lender.name: Rajni
lender.loan_because: I want to repay the kindness of people who helped us when we needed it.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I want capitalism to flourish throughout the world. It is the most effective way to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Helping small company teams successfully serve the customers and market through new products and outstanding service.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: This is a good way to help, and I can be certain that the money arrives to people that need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an oil company.

lender.name: Jess Duran
lender.loan_because:
There's no greater satisfaction in this world than serving others.
My parents come from a very poor rural town in Mexico. I could never repay my parents back for all they've done for me, but I can always "pay it forward" to reach and touch someone else.
I have a VERY comfortable lifestyle here in America, and this reminds me of how blessed we really are.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Media/Communications.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to have direct impact on an individual, family, and community. Once the loan is repaid, I can do it again.

lender.name: Halo Noir
lender.loan_because: Things would've been easier if someone had helped me with my entrepreneurial efforts. Also, I believe this method of help truly makes a difference and isn't just a "temporary fix"!

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: Affordable Price
lender.occupational_info:
Hello my friend,
I hope you are well!
This is ANTHONY LIM and I wanted to give you a quick heads up on a great new system, that helps you gain access to one of the most wanted and profitable businesses around at a fraction of the usual cost.
Rather than trying to explain everything here, I have set up a special link with everything you need to know:
http://www.vibolfilms.com
If you have any questions, please contact me.
Thanks and hope to hear from you soon.
Your successfully, ANTHONY LIM ANTHOTIM@AOL.COM

lender.name: mary brennan
lender.loan_because: the way to freedom is by helpiing people to support themselves and their family

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: It feels great. Because prosperity is easier to share than ever before. Because everyone who dreams of having an independent business should get the chance to make it work.
lender.occupational_info: My company writes materials that promote other businesses (mostly entertainment companies and nonprofits).

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: $25 doesn't seem like a lot to me, but it could mean the world to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse on an in-patient mental health unit.

lender.name: Carlos & Amy
lender.loan_because: So others can have a better life...
lender.occupational_info: Military

lender.name: Ryosuke
lender.loan_because: I like the people who are doing or planning new things.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in a life across the world.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I'm surrounded by a community of people who encourage me to help others get out of poverty in a just way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university. I study youth minstry (like teaching youth about God in a way they will understand)

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: because I can. When I am having a bad day and whining this helps me to realize I really have NO idea! I am the luckiest girl in the world.
lender.occupational_info: accounting, taxes, dog rescue and pet portraits
